questions.title: 我喜欢早上散步胜过在下午跑步。
questions.answer: I prefer walking in the morning to running in the afternoon.

questions.title: 我的姐妹们在夏天喜欢穿裙子胜过穿短裤。
questions.answer: My sisters prefer wearing skirt to short trousers in hot summer.

questions.title: 我的大部分同学喜欢湖南卫视胜过上海卫视。
questions.answer: Most of my classmates prefer HNTV to SBN.

questions.title: 与言情小说相比，我更喜欢武侠小说。
questions.answer: I prefer chivalrous story to romance novels.

title: ——泰国和日本相比，我喜欢泰国。
——泰国全年都太热了。

answer.en: It's too hot in Thailand all year.

title: ——我的儿子喜欢炸鸡胜过鸡汤。
——油炸食品不健康。

answer.en: My son prefers fried chicken to chicken soup.

title: ——当今的年轻人相比商场购物更喜欢网络购物。
——网络发展很快。

answer.en: Young people today prefer shopping online to shopping in the mall.
